mapper.select: select id, country_id as countryId, name, topCity, status from city where status = 1 and country_id = ( select country_id from city where id = #{id} and status = 1 )

select country.id, country.name, countrycode as countryCode, country.status from country left join city on country.id = city.country_id and city.id where country.status = 1 and city.status = 1 and city.id = #{cityId}

select t1.id cityId, t1.name cityName, t1.topCity, t2.id collegeId, t2.name collegeName, t2.original_name originalName, t2.topCollege from city t1 left join college t2 on t1.id = t2.city_id where t1.status = 1 and t2.status = 1 and t1.country_id = #{countryId} group by t2.id

select t1.id cityId, t1.name cityName, t1.topCity, t2.id collegeId, t2.name collegeName, t2.original_name originalName, t2.topCollege from city t1 left join college t2 on t1.id = t2.city_id where t1.status = 1 and t2.status = 1 and t1.country_id in ( select country_id from city where id = #{cityId} ) group by t2.id
